option.value: <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24" android:tint="?attr/colorOnSurface"> <path android:fillColor="@android:color/white" android:pathData="M20,8h-3V4H3C1.9,4 1,4.9 1,6v6.2c0,0.45 0.54,0.67 0.85,0.35L2,12.2l0.64,0.35C3.46,12.87 4,12.65 4,12.2V7h13v10H9v2c0,0.55 0.45,1 1,1h2l2.25,2.25c0.31,0.31 0.85,0.09 0.85,-0.35V20h2c1.1,0 2,-0.9 2,-2V10C22,8.9 21.1,8 20,8z"/> </vector>

option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24" android:tint="?attr/colorOnPrimary"> <path android:fillColor="@android:color/white" android:pathData="M17,3L5,3c-1.11,0 -2,0.9 -2,2v14c0,1.1 0.89,2 2,2h14c1.11,0 2,-0.9 2,-2L21,7l-4,-4zM12,19c-1.66,0 -3,-1.34 -3,-3s1.34,-3 3,-3 3,1.34 3,3 -1.34,3 -3,3zM15,9L5,9L5,5h10v4z"/> </vector>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24" android:tint="?attr/colorOnSurface"> <path android:fillColor="@android:color/white" android:pathData="M13,3C16.31,3 19,5.69 19,9L19,10L20,10C21.11,10 22,10.89 22,12L22,20C22,21.11 21.11,22 20,22L4,22C2.89,22 2,21.11 2,20L2,12C2,10.89 2.89,10 4,10L5,10L5,9C5,5.69 7.69,3 11,3L13,3M12,17C13.11,17 14,16.11 14,15C14,13.89 13.11,13 12,13C10.89,13 10,13.89 10,15C10,16.11 10.89,17 12,17M7,10L17,10L17,9C17,6.79 15.21,5 13,5L11,5C8.79,5 7,6.79 7,9L7,10Z"/> </vector>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".ui.measurement.ARMeasurementActivity">
<androidx.fragment.app.FragmentContainerView android:id="@+id/arFragment" android:name="com.paxel.arspacescan.ui.measurement.CustomArFragment" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
<View android:id="@+id/gridOverlay" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/grid_overlay" android:alpha="0.2" />
<!-- Instructions moved to be direct child of ConstraintLayout --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvInstructions" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_gradient_top" android:padding="16dp" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:text="Langkah 1/4: Ketuk sudut pertama di alas paket" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvWarning" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_fail" android:padding="8dp" android:text="@string/angle_validation_warning" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textAlignment="center" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tvInstructions" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/bottom_controls_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/bg_gradient_bottom" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnUndo" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton.Icon" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/undo" android:textColor="@color/white" app:icon="@drawable/ic_undo" app:iconTint="@color/white" app:strokeColor="@color/white" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnReset" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton.Icon" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/reset" android:textColor="@color/white" app:icon="@drawable/ic_refresh" app:iconTint="@color/white" app:strokeColor="@color/white" />
</LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnTakePhoto" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.Icon" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="@string/ambil_bukti_foto" android:textColor="@color/white" android:visibility="gone" app:backgroundTint="@color/primary_dark" app:icon="@drawable/ic_camera" app:iconTint="@color/white" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/bottom_controls_container" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Tombol Lanjutkan ke Hasil Pengukuran --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnContinueToResult" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="@string/btn_continue_to_result" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:visibility="gone" app:backgroundTint="@color/paxel_red" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:icon="@drawable/ic_arrow_forward" app:iconTint="@color/white" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/btnTakePhoto" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Optimized tracking help using compound drawable --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvTrackingHelp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" android:background="#CC000000" android:padding="24dp" android:text="@string/detecting_surface" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:drawableTop="@drawable/ic_move_device" android:drawablePadding="16dp" android:drawableTint="@color/white" android:contentDescription="@string/ar_tracking_help_icon" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Optimized object detection warning using compound drawable --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvObjectDetectionMessage" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="80dp" android:visibility="gone" android:background="@drawable/bg_counter_badge" android:padding="16dp" android:text="@string/camera_instruction" android:textColor="@color/warning_dark" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_help" android:drawablePadding="12dp" android:drawableTint="@color/warning_dark" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:contentDescription="@string/ar_tracking_help_icon" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Price Estimation Display --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvPriceEstimation" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_counter_badge" android:gravity="center" android:padding="12dp" android:text="@string/estimated_price_medium" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/btnContinueToResult" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".ui.measurement.ARMeasurementActivity">
<androidx.fragment.app.FragmentContainerView android:id="@+id/arFragment" android:name="com.paxel.arspacescan.ui.measurement.CustomArFragment" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
<View android:id="@+id/gridOverlay" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/grid_overlay" android:alpha="0.2" />
<!-- Instructions moved to be direct child of ConstraintLayout --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvInstructions" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_gradient_top" android:padding="16dp" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:text="Langkah 1/4: Ketuk sudut pertama di alas paket" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvWarning" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_fail" android:padding="8dp" android:text="@string/angle_validation_warning" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textAlignment="center" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tvInstructions" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/bottom_controls_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/bg_gradient_bottom" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnUndo" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton.Icon" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/undo" android:textColor="@color/white" app:icon="@drawable/ic_undo" app:iconTint="@color/white" app:strokeColor="@color/white" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnReset" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton.Icon" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/reset" android:textColor="@color/white" app:icon="@drawable/ic_refresh" app:iconTint="@color/white" app:strokeColor="@color/white" />
</LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnTakePhoto" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.Icon" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="@string/ambil_bukti_foto" android:textColor="@color/white" android:visibility="gone" app:backgroundTint="@color/primary_dark" app:icon="@drawable/ic_camera" app:iconTint="@color/white" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/bottom_controls_container" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Tombol Lanjutkan ke Hasil Pengukuran --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnContinueToResult" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="@string/btn_continue_to_result" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:visibility="gone" app:backgroundTint="@color/paxel_red" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:icon="@drawable/ic_arrow_forward" app:iconTint="@color/white" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/btnTakePhoto" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Optimized tracking help using compound drawable --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvTrackingHelp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" android:background="#CC000000" android:padding="24dp" android:text="@string/detecting_surface" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:drawableTop="@drawable/ic_move_device" android:drawablePadding="16dp" android:drawableTint="@color/white" android:contentDescription="@string/ar_tracking_help_icon" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Optimized object detection warning using compound drawable --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvObjectDetectionMessage" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="80dp" android:visibility="gone" android:background="@drawable/bg_counter_badge" android:padding="16dp" android:text="@string/camera_instruction" android:textColor="@color/warning_dark" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_help" android:drawablePadding="12dp" android:drawableTint="@color/warning_dark" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:contentDescription="@string/ar_tracking_help_icon" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Price Estimation Display --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvPriceEstimation" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_counter_badge" android:gravity="center" android:padding="12dp" android:text="@string/estimated_price_medium" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/btnContinueToResult" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:visibility="visible" />
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cvTrackingHelp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="top" android:visibility="gone" android:padding="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/cardview_light_background" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Arahkan kamera ke permukaan datar untuk memulai pengukuran" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:gravity="center"/> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Package size options for the dropdown --> <string-array name="package_size_options"> <item>Kecil (Small) - max 10cm x 10cm x 10cm</item> <item>Sedang (Medium) - max 20cm x 20cm x 20cm</item> <item>Besar (Large) - max 30cm x 30cm x 30cm</item> <item>Ekstra Besar (XL) - max 40cm x 40cm x 40cm</item> <item>Jumbo - max 50cm x 50cm x 50cm</item> </string-array> </resources>
